data.eml:eml: The genus Passaloecus Shuckard (Hymenoptera: Crabronidae) from China with four new species and two new records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bashir, Nawaz Haider, Du, Shi-Jie, Yue, Dan, Li, Qiang, Ma, Li (2019): The genus Passaloecus Shuckard (Hymenoptera: Crabronidae) from China with four new species and two new records. Zootaxa 4629 (3): 428-440, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4629.3.10
